name: Bird Game (itch)
description:
Bird Game is a short and difficult zen-like fly 'em up where you navigate a bird through a black-and-white line drawing landscape.

You control a bird and must navigate obstacles and defeat bosses with a control scheme similar to Star Fox 64.

Key Features
  • Explore 3 well thought-out levels, each with a unique boss fight
  • Black-and-white ink-drawing visual style
  • Replay the game in hard mode after your first completion for a true challenge
  • Eat fish
